website_summaries.verdict: An adjustable full-body safety harness designed for sports and fall protection. If you're looking for a harness the whole family can use, this product may appeal to you.
pros: Manufacturer claims that it will fit most people
There are also several half-body models available
cons: Some consumers prefer a size-specific harness
For example, if you are very small, this harness requires some precise adjustments to fit right

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese Knock Off
customer_reviews.text: Looks great until you look at it a little closer. Insufficient Bar Tacks. Only one per buckle instead of the standard three. No box stitching where webbing overlaps, just single low density bar tacks. Very light weight flat webbing. No Certifications, CE, ANSI, OSHA, NFPA, UIAA, ETC.. None. I cannot use this harness, I can't trust someone's life with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Certification labels
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable belt. Have worn it for 8+ hours at a time. Good quality. Only problem I have had is receiving the product without the CE certification labels. Description says certified. Pictures show label. Yet half the belts I have ordered do not have the labels on them. Running a gym, insurance requires certification. What to do? Suppose you can always order, hope for the best and return the ones without labels.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Nordin

customer_reviews.title: but super uncomfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy duty and well made, but super uncomfortable to wear. The heavy padding in the inner thigh is a PITA, and the straps aren't adjustable in the back, so it just never fits well. Definite risk to the dangley bits. I ended up making my daughter use this when we went climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FIT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I can trim my own palm trees. It is a very comfortable harness and has good support in all the right places.
customer_reviews.author: AZ bliss

customer_reviews.title: IT will work.
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky. This item has steel hook-ups. one on each hip. What I needed. It works . I like mine !
customer_reviews.author: Picky customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a great full-body harness for climbing or work, please look somewhere else. The money we paid for this product was not it's weight in gold!
customer_reviews.author: Ptsavedbyblood

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy and comfortable. Easily supports my full weight (220 lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Robert G Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This hook and strap has assisted my ability to climb and work on short antenna towers safely. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Erlewein N8CN

customer_reviews.title: Tower Climbing
customer_reviews.text: Needed something ot increase safety while climbing tower.. Very nice! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: cbrnurse

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Good to use for roofing when it comes to tearing off in steeper slopes especially since you have the rope grab in the front instead of the back like a traditional harness
customer_reviews.author: JT UNLIMITED CONSTRUCTION

customer_reviews.title: As described. Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and I will be safe climbing my tree I will cut down.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The perfect belt to walk dogs
customer_reviews.text: I use to walk dogs. It is great!, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE FOR CLIMBING
customer_reviews.text: To dangerous to use. Not worth the money to put your body in it. Save your money SAVE YOUR LIFE!!!
customer_reviews.author: daniel steffes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful it looks better in person than it did in the picture the hooks are huge. The quality is outstanding and you will feel safe hanging in a tree!
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Run
customer_reviews.text: Came with no instructions on proper use and packaged poorly. Don't buy this if your life is on the line
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: A great budget harness for Paramotor kiting
customer_reviews.text: I got this harness as the cheapest possible option to use for ground handeling/kiting my paramotor wing. It does the job beautifully, and it's honestly really comfortable. I only have two small complaints: it has no buckles for easy on/off (so you have to tighten and loosen it each time) and that it barely tightens up on me. I am a very small person at 5'4" and 127 lbs. It takes all of the adjustment to get it tight, but it does the job. Overall, I'm really happy with it for the price and would recommend it for other Paramotor pilots on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: Better value than local recreational stores
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price. Has been well worth the money in my line of work. Residential remodeling, on steep roofs now and then. Have recently took up rock climbing, amd feel safe and secure climbing in it on wkends as well as construction use thru the week in Knoxville TN.
customer_reviews.author: David Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I work as a zip line tour guide and this harness was a must. Comfortable and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: job

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the fact that it has leg straps and but also the d-rings to add a flip line to.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent for hanging deer stands. It's fairly comfortable with the padded straps behind the legs and around the lower back. It is definitely sturdy and connection points are solid.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I felt pretty fairly secure especially since it was my first time usinks spikes
customer_reviews.author: JAIRO

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I work in Search & Rescue. I decided to buy my own gear.
customer_reviews.author: James B Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great !AAA+++
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money! Thanks for you quick and honest service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Durable, sturdy and comfortable all at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: The price and durability are both great. My son feels safe and now I am confident that he will have safe and sturdy rig when he questions the safety of any provided equipment of a tree crew. Nothing digs and the saddle are comfortable. He’s thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: MoHudson

customer_reviews.title: Caution!!! Check all stitching!!!
customer_reviews.text: Checked over the harness in details before using -- noted unsewn stitching. Or damage? Where back harness attaches to the back belt. ALWAYS CHECK GEAR BEFORE USE!! I will need to make some "repairs" ie -- double backstitching -- over these loose threading to make it safe for use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t have the quality that I thought... this item came with a gift and it never did arrive
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Almendarez Sr

product_meta.title: YaeCCC Climbing Harness Belt for Fire Rescue High Altitude School Assignment Caving Rock Climbing Rappelling Equipment Body Guard Protect
product_meta.description:
This is a universal fits climbing harness with comfortable adjustable and safe belt
It is great for rock climbing, Mountain climbing,tree climbing,Rescue or climbing in gym

Why Choose us?
1,The climbing harness made from polyester with a reinforced tie-in point and stitching
The climbing harness will last even under high use conditions like a climbing gym or ropes course.
2,It is a universal climbing harness fits a Wide range of body sizes, great for family with growing kids, Suitable for all family members
3,Inexpensive climbing harness, It save money when you go gym for rock climbing, You do not need to pay every time $5 Harness rent fee
4, The climbing harness is CE Qualified product 
5, This climbing harness widely used in Mountain climbing, High-altitude development, High-altitude operations, Fire rescue, Caving, Rappelling, Crayoning, Escape

What Is In Package?
★Climbing harness *1
SPECIAL ATTENTION
For rock climbing and mountaineering. Climbing is dangerous. You are responsible for your own actions and decisions. 
Familiarize yourself with this climbing harness's capabilities and limitations. We recommend every climber seek qualified instruction. 
Please have all equipments safety checked by a qualified professional prior to use.
feature_bullets: CE Certified, Safety first! Shoulder straps for seat harness;Designed for taking the load from the waistbelt and redistributing it to the shoulders for improved comfort
Straps connect to the ventral attachment point of the harness and to the two slots at the rear of the waistbelt
Adjustable, one size fit most Material;High strength polyester.Weight limited:800KG.Breaking strength:22KN
Professional Rock Tree Climbing Fall Protection Safety Harness Carving Equip

It can be used to rock climbing,floor escape,rappelling; Material: High strength polyester, aluminum alloy ;Waist Perimeter: approx. 80 - 140cm / 31.5- 55.1 inch Leg Perimeter: approx. 60- 75cm / 23.6 - 29.5 inch
